title: Installation issue: Error installing rdma-core with intel compiler
body:
Error installing rema-cores with intel compiler

Hi,
I am not able to install rema-core with intel compilers, I do:

spack install rdma-core@28.0 %intel@19.1.3.304

And I get the follow errors:

Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
'make'

17 errors found in build log:
193 cd /tmp/spack/spack-stage/spack-stage-w5G6WU/rdma-core-28.0/spack-build/util && /mnt/lustre/ohpc/admin/spack/0.12.1/lib/spack/env/intel/icc -I/tmp/spack/spack-stage/spack-stage-w5G6WU/rdma-core-28.0/spack-build/
include -I/mnt/lustre/ohpc/admin/spack/0.12.1/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-19.1.3.304/libnl-3.3.0-ccd5pebsjrteroopxpldipztmivdz2sh/include/libnl3 -Wall -Wextra -Wno-sign-compare -Wno-unused-parameter -Wm
issing-prototypes -Wmissing-declarations -Wwrite-strings -Wformat=2 -Wshadow -Wstrict-prototypes -Wold-style-definition -O2 -g -DNDEBUG -fPIC -std=gnu11 -o CMakeFiles/rdma_util_pic.dir/rdma_nl.c.o -c /mnt/lus

include -I/mnt/lustre/ohpc/admin/spack/0.12.1/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-19.1.3.304/libnl-3.3.0-ccd5pebsjrteroopxpldipztmivdz2sh/include/libnl3 -Wall -Wextra -Wno-sign-compare -Wno-unused-parameter -Wm
issing-prototypes -Wmissing-declarations -Wwrite-strings -Wformat=2 -Wshadow -Wstrict-prototypes -Wold-style-definition -O2 -g -DNDEBUG -fPIC -std=gnu11 -o CMakeFiles/rdma_util_pic.dir/util.c.o -c /mnt/lustre

include -I/mnt/lustre/ohpc/admin/spack/0.12.1/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-19.1.3.304/libnl-3.3.0-ccd5pebsjrteroopxpldipztmivdz2sh/include/libnl3 -Wall -Wextra -Wno-sign-compare -Wno-unused-parameter -Wm
